ComicInfo.Summary: One hundred employees of an Internet firm based in Melbourne also happen to be members of a bizarre cult intent on going to the Heavens. Unfortunately they seem determined to bring an obscene number of unwilling souls with them...unless Miranda Zero and the men and women on the Global Frequency can stop them.
ComicInfo.Title: Heaven's One Hundred
ComicInfo.Penciller: Roy Allan Martinez,Warren Ellis,Roy Allan Martinez
ComicInfo.Inker: Roy Allan Martinez,Warren Ellis,Roy Allan Martinez
